about_the_game:
"Let's Patiti!" is a multiplayer party game that supports 2-4 players, available for both online and local play. In the game, you will play as an adorable little cat, engaging in a spirited chase and cunning competition with your feline friends or AI in the "Meow Meow Forest". Within the forest, you'll encounter a variety of random events on the map, collect all sorts of peculiar items, and use these items to engage in intense and thrilling mini-games. Finally, only by sprinting to the
finish line with all your might in the forest can you achieve ultimate victory!

Leisurely Seeing the Southern Mountain.




The lovely KK is waiting for you at the forest food cart.




Of course, we will play mini-games in the forest!
detailed_description:
关注我们

Dear players,

Thank you for your continuous support and enthusiastic feedback for our game. If you would like to learn more about the latest information, please follow our social media accounts:

Our official Xiaohongshu account: 独立游戏Let's Patiti!


Our QQ group: 106727313

We will continuously improve the gaming experience. Thank you for your understanding and support, and we wish you a pleasant time in the game!

The Patiti Team


Thank you for your support

Dear players,

We are deeply sorry to see that Patiti has encountered some bugs during its initial release. We value your feedback greatly and are working tirelessly to address these issues to provide a better gaming experience.

We have detailed the known bugs in the Steam update notes and will continue to provide regular updates on our progress. Furthermore, we have established feedback channels through social media, the official website, and within the game itself, encouraging everyone to actively report issues. We will promptly respond and consider valuable suggestions.

We understand that these issues may have affected your gaming experience, and for this, we sincerely apologize. Please believe that our team is fully committed to resolving these issues and promises to provide solutions in future updates.

Known bugs and temporary solutions are as follows:

For the phenomenon of red screen and yellow screen, please lower the graphics quality on the game's main interface.
Players are unable to change graphics quality back at the lobby after the game has ended. Change graphics quality at the game's startup instead.
If the game freezes on the loading screen, it may be due to a player's high graphics setting. Close the game, reopen, and adjust the graphics quality to continue playing.
Currently, in public rooms, it's possible to encounter full rooms that still appear in searches. Attempting to enter these rooms may lead to game freezes. Close the game and search for a new room to join the game.
During this process, if you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to reach out to us. We appreciate your support and patience and look forward to presenting a more refined Patiti for you in the future.

Thank you!


About the Game

"Let's Patiti!" is a multiplayer party game that supports 2-4 players, available for both online and local play. In the game, you will play as an adorable little cat, engaging in a spirited chase and cunning competition with your feline friends or AI in the "Meow Meow Forest". Within the forest, you'll encounter a variety of random events on the map, collect all sorts of peculiar items, and use these items to engage in intense and thrilling mini-games. Finally, only by sprinting to the
finish line with all your might in the forest can you achieve ultimate victory!

Leisurely Seeing the Southern Mountain.




The lovely KK is waiting for you at the forest food cart.




Of course, we will play mini-games in the forest!
name: Let's Patiti!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 bit Windows 10、64 bit Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 bit Windows 10、64 bit Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-11700KF
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: "Let's Patiti!" is a multiplayer party game that supports 2-4 players and can be played online or locally. In the game, you take on the role of an adorable little cat, engaging in a game of chase and cunning competition with your "Meow Meow" friends or AI in the "Meow Meow Forest".
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
